skins.selfIntroduction: Third ship of the Kagerou-class, Kuroshio. As part of the 2nd Fleet and Destroyer Division 15, I joined in the Battle of the Java Sea, operations in the South Pacific, the Third Battle of the Solomon Islands, and other engagements until I was sunk during a transport mission. ... I will not let that happen again. I will commit all of my resources to ensure that I am of service to Your Grace.
skins.acquisition: Third ship of the Kagerou-class, Kuroshio reporting in... I am here to carry out my master's will.
skins.details: Your Grace... Please don't stare at me so...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hm...? Your Grace? Did you want me to say something?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I am not sure what to say... But I would be happy to listen to anything Your Grace wishes to impart.
skins.secretaryIdle3: The flower in my hair? It was a gift from Oyashio. Oyashio, she's... very colorful.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: As this body belongs to Your Grace, please do with it as you will... Nnng... Aaaah...
